channel.title: Octatrack and Axoloti - Clouds patch
channel.description:
hi everybody. i have tested octatrack and axoloti - mutable instruments patch. octatrack cue out goes to axoloti in, and axoloti out goes back to octatrack in. in this case, i send snare drum. octa's midi lfo's control different parameters of clouds patch. much fun, all i can say :slight_smile :slight_smile:
https://youtu.be/Rexm1ETXf6Y

item.title: Octatrack and Axoloti - Clouds patch
item.dc:creator: @qca Uros
item.description:
@qca wrote:

Thank you!
My intention is not to use this way. As u said, axoloti's lfo and randomization and then use just one midi track on octa. I can send/ have 8 cc controls over axo's parameters on just one track/channel.

Read full topic

item.title: Octatrack and Axoloti - Clouds patch
item.dc:creator: @reubenfinger
item.description:
@reubenfinger wrote:

Nice, thanks for the video,

Similarly, I use the digitakts Lfo, but with only one Lfo per midi track it makessense to use randomisation and Lfos in the axo board itself, but yes indeed it's tonnes o' fun

Read full topic
